DOC.detailed_description: This open-labeled , single-center Phase IV clinical trial . The study consist patient moderate hypovolemia/dehydration require parenteral rehydration . It expect study describe onset change cardiac output use Hylenex augment subcutaneous rehydration age 2 month 3 year flow rate satisfy clinical need , especially reference change cardiac output observe standard intravenous rehydration .
